roleset.name: call to court
roleset.note: COUNTERSUE-V NOTES: Crime and prize cannot cooccur, to my ear, but I don't want toseparate these into two rolesets--they're too closely related. (from countersue.01-v)

example.name: with crime
example.text: MGM/UA has countersued Qintex Australia for breach of contract and fraud over the collapsed acquisition agreement, and Qintex Australia has threatened a countersuit.
example.arg: for breach of contract and fraud

example.name: with prize
example.text: John countersued Mary for a zillion dollars.
